title: Blue Light Alley
description:
A story of introspection, mental health, identity, and relationships: In the cyberpunk city of Sunset Neon, life is hard, technology meets most of our needs, yet not all of them. You play as ‘The Advisor’, a mysterious, impartial, and identity-less figure that offers ‘advising sessions’ to their clients. You must help your clients succeed in life and learn valuable lessons.
Change their life and the course of the story through your words. Guide them towards the right path, if there is one. Gain experience after each session and become better at your job. Be their inner voice in this journey of self-discovery… and who knows, maybe you’ll learn something about yourself too. But remember, at the end of the day, you’re just an advisor.

title: Chronondrum
description: A timeless battle… or time-full shall I say?: You’re a hero in an epic inter-tempo-spatial battle against your arch-nemesis. The thing is, messing with the space-time continuum is a tricky business. You’ll have to use your wits and your weapons to save the world.
skills: Smart AI that adapts to your playstyle

title: Journey to the Dreamy Nebula
description: Welcome to DR-34M! A galaxy so peaceful you are meant to fall asleep: Your astronaut is collecting stars, you have to supervise them. Here’s the catch, they collect one star at a time. Try to not fall asleep...
skills: Collect stars and unlock new galaxies
A relaxing experience to fall asleep to

title: Kylus’s Guide to the Wildlands
description: Arcana in a Forgotten World: You play as Kylus, a young arcana apprentice that was sent to the ‘Wildlands’ by his Master.  Explore this forgotten world, survive  the mystical dangers, make friends, and remember that you are here to learn.
skills: A modular language that acts as a magic system: learn the language while learning arcana
Rogue-like RPG with a real-time combat system

title: Perfect Crime
description: 7 days... Someone’s gonna kill someone in 7 days. You know one thing: they frequent this bar. Your job as the detective is to figure out both who’s the killer and who’s the victim. Converse with the patrons, gather clues, build rapport over the week, and choose who’s going to jail. If you fail, don’t worry, you can always try again!
